name: The Gemstone Chronicles
description:
The Gemstone Chronicles follows the Player as they enact the will in a region in crisis as they traverse the coast helping, hindering, liberating, or conquering
the major factions biding for control over the land where gemstones encrust the soil and tension fills the air. 

This is also a Projet Get Game Done or  P-GG-D where the goal is to just get a game out there so it will relay having on RPG Maker stock assist in terms of art and systems... I do intend to push it past its limits like having a complex web of interactions with missions, NPCs, and endings... 

This being the first P-GG-D in RPG Maker MV... 
I don't know how much I can do and still get the game done... 
So at least expect fun writing like my books and art and maybe a more
branching paths Visual Novel experience.

Oh and this game has a Dev log on Youtube!
